CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper July 28, 1962, pg. 1, reads: "They're in 'Can-Can' - You should make it a 'must' to see 'Can-Can' this week at the Civic Auditorium. It's a box-office hit for the Civic Light Opera, again. In addition to stars Genevieve and Norwood Smith, Erik Rhodes (left), Yvonne McDowell (center) of New York City, and Frank Ligons (right) of West View add their luster to the cast. Miss McDowell adds zest to the chorus line, while Mr. Ligons, a Duquesne University product, performs with the male singing ensemble. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Civic Light Opera cast members of "Can Can" Erik Rhodes, Yvonne McDowell wearing dark leotard with zippered bodice, and Frank Ligons in dressing room of Civic Arena
